B00BTFK07I.text: Horrible movie. No plot. Just a bunch of guys running around in the woods, mostly at night. The cover of the DVD shows an epic in a bombed city. None of this is in the movie. Like I said, it's just several bad-acting guys reading nonsense unemotional dialog in the woods. Terrible camera work, it made me dizzy at times as the camera man couldn't keep anything steady.

B00BTFK07I.title: You

B00BTFK07I.title: "Possibly the worst movie I have ever seen
B00BTFK07I.text: I must say that the unanimous one-star reviews of this film piqued my curiosity so much that I signed out 'Battle Earth' from the Albany Library.  And I st through the entire production absolutely dumbfounded.  The reviews I read were neither exaggerated nor inaccurate.  As one critic said, "Possibly the worst movie I have ever seen."  Without wasting more time and original commentary, I must say that the quote adequately sums it up nicely.

B00BTFK07I.title: This is a B movie
B00BTFK07I.text:
This is a B movie, that is a low-budget commercial motion picture that is not definitive, A squad of Canadian soldiers survive a
helicopter crash. This is deep behind enemy lines during an alien invasion. Now there motivation is to survive the night. When
another helicopteris hoped to come and rescue them. This is do on a shoestring operationly budget, made exclusive by a very poor
script, and too many non actors flopping around the screen, into a movie that should have been 22 minuets and was badly streached to 90 minuets.

B00BTFK07I.title: Ahhh!
B00BTFK07I.text: I didn't like it.  It was a bad "B" movie and I have seen a ton of them; the acting of soldiers was very bad and the aliens just looked plain stupid.  I just can't understand why someone would make a bad "B" movie.  The best thing about this movie was the graphic art on the DVD case.

B01GU8CL5C.title: Totally pointless
B01GU8CL5C.text: WTF was this movie even about?!? I watched the entire thing and ended up rewinding parts to try to figure out what exactly happened and still went away confused as to the point of the movie... I know the premise, but the point.... come on?!?

B01GU8CL5C.title: I will never get the time back.......
B01GU8CL5C.text: I have watched some pretty bizarre films in my lifetime - I cannot even discribe this film with the term "bizarre" because just because something is bizarre to me doesn't mean I won't like it.  But I hated this film.  I will never regain the time back from watching it.  I hung on really hoping it would get better however, it just got worse - I suppose the necrophilia was added for shock value?  But frankly it just made me all the more disgusted that I wasted the time.

B01GU8CL5C.title: Knife rape should be a deal breaker
B01GU8CL5C.text: If keanu raping a 16 yo with a knife is a deal breaker for you then please don't ruin your night by watching this. Knife Rape is not art. Anyone who thinks it is, is hopelessly lost.

B01GU8CL5C.title: Fail, fail, fail
B01GU8CL5C.text: The writer, director, producer and all the stars of this film should be banned from ever producing anything labeled as "Entertainment" again.  It failed in every aspect of its production.  I think it was supposed to be "Arty" but obviously anyone tasked with this portion of the film has never seen an arty style flick. Fail, fail, fail. Embarrassingly so.

B01GU8CL5C.title: unique and visually stunning vaprwave nightmare
B01GU8CL5C.text: i will start by saying if you enjoy vaporwave this is a movie for you. every shot could be its own work of art. it was able to keep my attention. ive seen thousands of movies and this isnt like anything else out there right now. its great to be kept guessing again.

B01GU8CL5C.title: Visually Appealing...Yet Underwhelming
B01GU8CL5C.text: It wasn't the worst film I've ever watched...but that said, it definitely leaves some questions for the detail-oriented viewer and at times seems to grasp at an attempt to be overly obscure. Throw in a dash of lesbo-eroticism and I was genuinely confused about certain scenes that seemed forced and out of place. Elle Fanning is always exceptional, but her character is somewhat of a hindrance to her talent and wavers between mysterious and underdeveloped in this particular film.

B01GU8CL5C.title: Excellence
B01GU8CL5C.text: Stylistically creative work melding symbolic visuality with an inspired score. Stunning. What is hidden in the shadows of imagination, of the "unconscious" interiority common to everyone and which expresses itself in dream and daydream, the realm hidden to the exterior world, source of occultic and creative arts and unbidden inspiration of every sort, naturally makes uncomfortable those who are anchored in the concrete, sensate world experienced as solid, substantial and "real."

B00DKIH7PU.title: Blah...
B00DKIH7PU.text: This movie didn't hold my interest at all, so I didn't get very far into it.  There were no compelling characters, the actors were unconvincing, and the story might have been interesting if it had been worked on a little longer.  Disappointing...

B00DKIH7PU.title: Premise great. Execution not so.
B00DKIH7PU.text: The basic story line was compelling but the writing for its flow and the directing was confusing & lacking focus.  Where did these invaders come from? What was the impact on Earth for this invasion?  It was just plain muddled.

B00DKIH7PU.title: Truly Awful
B00DKIH7PU.text: Along with good SciFi I enjoy some of the grade B and cult classic movies. This was as far removed from an enjoyable movie as it's possible to get. Everyone involved should be totally embarrassed!

B00DKIH7PU.title: Don't waste your time, I mean it!
B00DKIH7PU.text: This movie should deserve ZERO star! Don't waste your time on this movie. I never unfinished any movie in my past, this is the first movie that I really have to stop, but I still wasted 35 minutes of my time to this POS.

B00DKIH7PU.title: Not Much to Hold My Attention
B00DKIH7PU.text:
I could only handle the first 10 minutes, and shut if off.

It was so slow and plodding, that I was just bored to death. And there wasn't much in the way of battles either. Maybe there was more to watch, but I couldn't get past the first part of the reel (if a reel is even used anymore).

B00DKIH7PU.title: Terrible, doesn't even rate as a "B" grade movie.
B00DKIH7PU.text: The aliens, when you did get to see one were cheapo fakes.  No fighting in streets, it was all limited to the same woods.  Mostly a lot of gunfire into the trees.  What a waste.

B00DKIH7PU.title: bad sci-fi
B00DKIH7PU.text: Third rate sci-fi, with a group of poorly trained weekend warriors fighting aliens that look like men with octopi on their head with funny looking shotguns that gives off a blue light when shot.

B00DKIH7PU.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!
B00DKIH7PU.text: Don't waste your time! Bad acting, bad story line, and bad special effects. It reminded me of one of those "low-budget" Syfy channel made-for-TV movies. I went back to the Amazon site afterwards to read the reviews on this movie and apparently I'm not the only one that wasted their time. Don't do like I did and rent the movie based on it's cover and description, read the reviews first. I would have given it half a star if I could have.

B00DKIH7PU.title: So bad its entertaining
B00DKIH7PU.text: So bad its wonderful.  This is one of the worst movies made in recent memory.  Google the scathing reviews of this dog.  It is on par with Plan 9 From Outerspace.  Get your friends together to watch this disaster.

B00DKIH7PU.title: Pretty Bad....and I can watch some bad stuff
B00DKIH7PU.text: Don't waste your time watching this movie....It has really bad acting....scenes are usually too dark....fighting aliens and you barely see them.  Had to have been pretty low budget.  Probably the worst movie I've ever watched.

B00DKIH7PU.title: Please don't waste your time....
B00DKIH7PU.text: One of the worst movies I've seen. I'm sad I wasted an hour of my life watching this. I couldn't stand it anymore so I had to stop if half way through...

B00DKIH7PU.title: This was simply one of the worst movies I've ever seen
B00DKIH7PU.text: This was simply one of the worst movies I've ever seen. The acting was terrible and almost the entire movie take place in one area, one battle and no explanation (not that it would make much difference).

B00DKIH7PU.title: Not recommended for viewing.
B00DKIH7PU.text: I think there might of been a good plot, but the night scene, which was most of the movie, was so dark I couldn't see the actors or able to tell where they were.  I not even sure who the bad guys were.  I wouldn't recommend this movie as you could follow the plot very well.

B00DKIH7PU.title: A study of a small group's night in hell.
B00DKIH7PU.text: For half the movie this seemed hard to follow -- then I realized that this was not a space opera but an intimate exploration of a small group of men on a single assignment having to deal with an evening, a night, and a morning in an enemy infested  jungle ...  So the title is misleading.

B00DKIH7PU.title: stream always quits.
B00DKIH7PU.text: I canceled my prime before the end of the free month. I wasn't able to watch this movie, the stream is interrupted. I've yet to be able to watch a movie all the way through without the stream quiting, and I have to click my way back into the movie. Netflix always works.

B00DKIH7PU.title: Crummy Low Budget movie...don't waste your time...!
B00DKIH7PU.text: I love alien attack on Earth genre, but this movie totally sucks!  Big disappointment.  The story was cheesy, the acting poor.  Everything was shot outside in a small area so obviously it was a very low budget film.  Don't waste your time watching this trash!

B093JXP1G7.title: Horribly Disappointed Borat fan
B093JXP1G7.text: One minute you're watching comedy and then suddenly you're being preached to and bombarded with some very one-sided counter-theories and slanted political views.  Whether I agree with your views or not, don't tell me I'm about to watch comedy and then pull a bait and switch on me so you can shove your skewed beliefs down my throat.

B093JXP1G7.title: Poorly designed. Who's the target audience?
B093JXP1G7.text: The people who would even bother watching this, like myself, doesn't believe in any of this conspiracy nonsense and the information is pointless to me. The people who would have their "minds changed" by the information probably wouldn't even watch this garbage and on top of that there was such a poor job at presenting the information or enough of it. A complete waste of time. It felt like virtue signaling more than anything.

B093JXP1G7.title: Sacha likes to fool and humiliate
B093JXP1G7.text: I don't watch Sacha's productions because he likes to fool and humiliate people.  I don't know about political indoctrination, as others have mentioned here, as I didn't watch, but I don't want to be depressed, as he would have done to me.

B093JXP1G7.title: More of the same.
B093JXP1G7.text: Loved his first two movies, but then things went more toward tribal politics. Just comes off as a divisive mock-docu series that has a hint of what very few would subjectively call comedy. Oh well, the world we live in now.

B093JXP1G7.title: Spectacularly awful
B093JXP1G7.text: Why does Amazon keep inflicting its users with this liberal garbage? Not only does the series not age well (an episode dedicated to the "Covid started in a Lab conspiracy theory" looks silly with the new information we keep learning), it's simply not funny. Here's a tip, Amazon: The majority of the country is center-right. Not Far Left. Give it (and us) a rest. Where are the series that appeal to the Far Right? There are none. I wouldn't watch those either.

B093JXP1G7.title: What happened with this show? Awful!
B093JXP1G7.text: LOVED the 2 previous Borats. What in the world happened with this one? What happened to the politically incorrect jokes about EVERYONE? They are none existent and the quality of acting is very amateur. Odd. So disappointed!

B093JXP1G7.title: No one is buying this propaganda
B093JXP1G7.text: You really think that there is any evidence to link these people with these crimes? Although, today Fauci is back pedaling since evidence the virus came from a lab is close to being found out. What a joke this is. No one is buying it.

B093JXP1G7.title: Ministry of Propaganda
B093JXP1G7.text: This is basically The Ministry of Propaganda. You have to wonder, why put so much emphasis on things that are supposedly conspiracy theory? Ladies and Gentlemen you have now arrived at your destination...Germany in the 1930’s.

B093JXP1G7.title: Total garbage, don't waste your time.
B093JXP1G7.text: This movie is a disgrace to the original.  He went from being funny and creative, to just being some annoying sock puppet for liberal ideologies.  Take your garbage back to the UK, you are no longer of any use here.

B093JXP1G7.title: Liberal propaganda
B093JXP1G7.text: What an absolute failure of a program. The "debunking" portion of the show is just as silly as the Qanon thought process. Having experts talk down to a couple rednecks doesn't prove anything.

B093JXP1G7.title: Interesting idea - would have liked the videos to be longer
B093JXP1G7.text: This pair fascinates me. On the. one hand, they seem like morons willing to believe the most outlandish, hate-based lies. But they were kind-hearted souls who took a complete weirdo into their home in the middle of a pandemic. They were willing to meet with experts, even though they had been presented as the butt of a massive joke in the movie. I would have liked to have heard more of the details presented to them and more of their questions and responses. It would provide insights into what, exactly, makes them cling to ridiculous and hateful conspiracy theories.

B093JXP1G7.title: Should be more in-depth about subject matter
B093JXP1G7.text: This series is against conspiracy theories, the harm they cause, and also asks for evidence of conspiracy, yet ignores any credible sources that have presented evidence. Personally, I like the two guys from the movie but they are clearly not prepared enough to make a compelling argument-Lastly, I will say this, love one another and focus on the positive in life, keep your eyes on him and off the world. Blessings

B093JXP1G7.title: Interesting & funny show
B093JXP1G7.text: The first episode is a chunk pulled from the movie (plus maybe some extra footage?), so funny & entertaining if you liked the 2nd movie. The other episodes are very short (5-7 minutes each) that outline the different conspiracy theories. These seemed very limited to me. I would have liked them to be a bit longer & more in depth. They seemed to hit on certain aspects of the conspiracy theory, and ignore others.

B093JXP1G7.title: Not all conspiracies are false.
B093JXP1G7.text: Funny how the first "conspiracy" is for a legitimate theory about the Wuhan Lab that was suppressed by the media but is finally being taken seriously. I wonder how many other "conspiracies" in here will turn out to be true.

B093JXP1G7.title: Ignore the right wingers trash reviews. It’s decently funny.
B093JXP1G7.text:
Lmao. Yeah it’s not the most hilarious of his work but boy do the 1 star reviews really reveal how right wingers have no idea of how evidence or the scientific method in general works.

All this, China scary boogeyman bs.... Look all serious reports of the virus and where it originated in China, is unknown and requires extensive investigation. Of course the bigoted/racist party of the US is going to jump on the made in a lab definitively train with no evidence to back up the claim.

B093JXP1G7.title: Trump supporters will hate this.
B093JXP1G7.text: This goes from funny, to cringeworthy awkward to terrifyingly insane.  Please people, use a little critical thinking.  Skepticism is your friend.  I mark this down because they should have gone much further. Use street epistemology on these guys and challenge how they know what they think they know and it their methods are sound, because I promise you they are anything but sound.

B093JXP1G7.title: Watch all the episodes!
B093JXP1G7.text:
OMG! I could not believe that the same conspiracy theorists are trying to detract people from even watching the 1st episode with comments like "I could not finish the first episode because ...blah blah". Yes the truth might hurt them. But please hear the experts. What is tough, and these episodes demonstrate that, is the fact that those naysayers are very hard to dissuade even when presenting them with known facts from experts.
As a side note, the only thing I never could stand about Borat is the tacky, sometimes vulgar jokes, and they get tired after so many repetitions.

B093JXP1G7.title: Debunking bullshit is so much fun
B093JXP1G7.text: I love the premise of this short series. Take two close-minded dweebs and school them on conspiracies. To be fair, they were polite to the people they spoke with and seemed a little open-minded. Of course, did not expect them to become a HRC fan but otherwise debunks that ridiculous conspiracy. I can see why this series triggered all of the QAnon/Stop The Steal/Don't Tread on Me jackoffs. Worth a watch.

B093JXP1G7.title: Debunking bullshit is so much fun
B093JXP1G7.text: I love the premise of this short series. Take two close-minded dweebs and school them on conspiracies. To be fair, they were polite to the people they spoke with and seemed a little open-minded. Of course, did not expect them to become a HRC fan but otherwise debunks that ridiculous conspiracy. B093JXP1G7.title: Necessary and  hilarious. Best show on Prime
B093JXP1G7.text: I barely eve write reviews but couldn't help myself but do it for this show. Borat is a genius and this is the best series Amazon ever made. Please, keep 'em coming!

B093JXP1G7.title: Borat RULES!
B093JXP1G7.text: It has become too easy for Sacha to manipulate the weak minded. He is a genius provocateur. Easy to see how he can no longer perform as Borat. Great political satire. Brilliant!

B093JXP1G7.title: He has beautiful daughter that does a great Fertility Dance. High Five
B093JXP1G7.text:
There is no straddling the fence with Borat, you either love him, or you really love him. He just says and does so many silly and vulgar things, but thats his heritage, and will not attack him because of that, as these folks have been inbreeding in isolated valleys for generations.
I laugh like the old days now, and his specials are really appreciated. I have always thought he would be a great Sec. Of State and maybe Amazon should help him become a citizen of Uzbekistan once again.

B093JXP1G7.title: The people giving low star reviews are the conspiracy theorists
B093JXP1G7.text: This was such an amazing idea by the makers of the Subsequent Borat film! Remember those two conspiracy theorists Borat stayed with during lockdown? They're once again the focus here. The first episode reviews all the conspiracy theories they told Borat, and then the subsequent episodes have those two same men being educated by experts. It's such an amazing idea, even if it's still so hard to get past all the misinformation that has been spoon fed to these two men.

B093JXP1G7.title: Difficult watch but a must watch...
B093JXP1G7.text: Misinformation is everywhere and it is sad to see two fine people getting stuck in the middle of them all. We need some serious laws to stop misinformation and lies over the internet or the consequences will be devastating.

B093JXP1G7.title: awkwardly accurate
B093JXP1G7.text: ...however, people with that much hate in their hearts, and indoctrinated into a religion that forgives hypocrisy with a simple stack of cash, people don't just change because they're faced with the truth about themselves, or realize their sworn "enemy" is actually a pretty nice guy. Borat is one hell of an actor tho, I gotta give the man some respect for that, definitely worth watching, if only for his performance.

B093JXP1G7.title: Great follow up
B093JXP1G7.text: I enjoyed this follow up with a breakdown of different issues. The two men that were in the original film display open minds and kind hearts. I believe that this series helps show that we are all the same. We are all human beings. We have to find a way to empathize with others, even when they are different than us. Well done. I felt the experts did a good job sharing their information, the two men did a good job sharing their concerns, and it was all lighthearted.

B093JXP1G7.title: Bittersweet
B093JXP1G7.text: I love Sacha Baron Cohen's approach to this wild narrative that unfortunately belongs to our collective American culture currently. Still so surreal that many of us are swayed by fear and political party membership rather than what is rational and good for the whole. Hilarious to watch and also quite sad this is our world for the time being.

B093JXP1G7.title: Don’t let people lie, this is HILARIOUS!!
B093JXP1G7.text: Look politics aside (mainly because I go back and forth so no I don’t have a “candidate” I support, I match my opinions with policies, which is what America used to do but it’s fine y’all can hate each other for different opinions.) This movie is stupid funny, it’s strictly entertainment and people don’t get that everything has to be political. But stupid Borat stuff he always does. It’s worth a watch!

B093JXP1G7.title: It's astounding that this even needs to be made.
B093JXP1G7.text: The conspiracy theories in here that need to be debunked are preposterous. Cohen does an amazing job of acting and encouraging these two men to talk. I don't know how he did it with a straight face. This show is hilarious, but at the same time very scary. It reminds me of a Carl Sagan quote "The dangers of not thinking clearly are much greater now than ever before. It's not that there's something new in our way of thinking - it's that credulous and confused thinking can be much more lethal in ways it was never before."

B093JXP1G7.title: folks everything is not black and white

B01I24FZ1Y.title: Why are you watching this movie?

This is not a template zany comedy with Danny DeVito.  This is a work of art by a director attempting to express a vision. It is by turns very funny and very sad and very upsetting. The cinematography is gorgeous.

B01I24FZ1Y.title: Walked Out
B01I24FZ1Y.text: This was an awful, self indulgent, disaster. Even by this directors standards, it was all shock and no value. Put me off of Sundance festival for a few years. It was so bad and I was galled by the committee’s lack of judgement. I don’t think I’ve ever reviewed an amazon movie, but couldn’t scroll by it without triggering the deep rage I felt when I watched this abhorrent nightmare. One is a star too many.

B01I24FZ1Y.title: Classic Todd Solondz
B01I24FZ1Y.text:
I would be amazed if the middle American class of Amazon's buyers -- perfectly portrayed in some scenes of the movie --would understand Todd Solondz.
This is not Todd's best movie, it is not a 5 stars (I would say 4/5) but it delivers a very classical and enjoyable (in the sense it makes you deeply think) portrait of the human condition. I felt the urge to balance back the idiocy of other reviews.

B01I24FZ1Y.title: SMH 🤦🏽‍♀️

In a nutshell, the Dachshund is a star taken for granted and a victim of tasteless art/screenplay and filming.

B00OHCJ0AS.title: Unbelievably bad! Terrible screenplay, bad plot, terrible dialogue, totally incompetent acting, horrible sound and lighting.

There is nothing more to say. There is nothing redeeming about this film.

B00OHCJ0AS.title: Valiant effort falls flat from poor acting choices!
B00OHCJ0AS.text: I give this production two stars for a valiant effort at Victorian atmosphere in terms of sets and costumes, especially with such a tiny budget. However, too many producer/directors overextend themselves by attempting to act in their own films, now matter how large or small the production. Anthony D.P. Mann commits the cardinal sin of playing the title role, even though he in no way resembles the character. Sadly, he is no Orson Welles. He should have spent more time teaching his amateur supporting cast how to properly project their characters to the camera.

B00RHRJKWS.title: The Last Days Of Atlantis: Kaptara
B00RHRJKWS.text: It's a shame Amazon got the title wrong... It's "The Last Days of Atlantis: Kaptara", not a very good movie, lots of gore, poor visuals, bad dialog sync to the characters, but 2 stars for a decent story.  The story of Atlantis, it's demise and how it came about.

B00RHRJKWS.title: Animated but enjoyable.

B00RHRJKWS.title: Difficult to imagine it being worse
B00RHRJKWS.text: It is remarkably bad. Even as an animation project, it's mind-numbingly poorly run. It's a wonder this "came together" as a film at all. Stupid story, awful acting, stodgy amateurish direction, insanely stupid writing, animation by, what, 3-4 different teams which didn't even share a character model. Seriously, I wanted all the characters to die, for being such morons. THAT would've served the human race. I've seen dozens of film student projects that would put this to shame.

B00RHRJKWS.title: Worth a view despite low budget
B00RHRJKWS.text:
Kaptara is a solid horror/fantasy/adventure movie worth watching if you enjoy the genre. I was skeptical going in based on the level of detail in the animation, but the movie didn't leave me disappointed. The monster was sympathetic. The heroine was seductive and intelligent. The hero had real flaws and real failures. The supporting cast added substantive conflict and was essential to the resolution. For being a low budget film, this is exceptional quality.

Five stars because the movie is underrated and worth a second look.

B00RHSZ2EM.title: Very distracting....
B00RHSZ2EM.text:

The art is also very disconcerting in the regards to how the characters mouths seen to never synch up to the sound. I am a fan of animated movies but this seems more like a fan fiction version than an actual movie.

B01GU87FNA.title: Wiener-Reviewers
B01GU87FNA.text: I can not get over the number of negative reviews from people who thought this was supposed to be some kind of Disney or Pixar feel-good animal movie. Todd Solondz films examine the sadness and horror of suburban reality, and most of them, like this one, are fantastic. Think Air Bud or Free Willy, but after the cameras stopped rolling.

B01GU87FNA.title: Solondz remains Solondz
B01GU87FNA.text: It's not Todd Solondz's best film and I would recommend starting with Happiness or Storytelling before watching Wiener-Dog. However Solondz's talent is on display here as well-- his great gift is placing the viewer into a room along with the characters and trapping them inside the scene--a feeling of immobility overwhelms you as you squirm and fight the cruelty of the scene, of the people. Sadistic, Perhaps. Still the mechanics of his style are unique and all filmmakers should study with care his ingenious ability to drag you through his world with your eyes wide open in horror.

B01GU87FNA.title: Funny, and more
B01GU87FNA.text: Off-beat, dark comedy presented as five vignettes.  It's a good, funny movie.  It's also more than funny with many well acted and touching scenes.  It's definitely not the "same old stuff" and it will make you think.  I recommend it completely.

B01GU87FNA.title: Solondz always tackles themes and events few directors will do
B01GU87FNA.text: Classic Todd Solondz film full of satire, pathos, and gallows humor. The film follows a wiener-dog across several owners each with their own issues and dramatic moments. The key for me is that Solondz does not shy from satire that viewers might find offensive or over the line. Without spoiling anything the fate of the title character is quite different from the usual, typical ending of a movie that is named after an animal. Recommended for those just a bit bitter about what life sometimes offers.

B01GU87FNA.title: This movie is about you!
B01GU87FNA.text: First of all, this is not a movie about the dog - she simply ties all the short stories together into a semi-cohesive whole. The movie is about you - your life - and how you hold together the random short stories in a semi-coherent way. Congrats! You survived!

B01GU87FNA.title: Deep Dark Dry Comedy Not For All.
B01GU87FNA.text: Todd Solondz brings it back to his roots in obtuse dry deeply dark comedy. Either you understand this level or you don't. Wiener-dog is suspiciously dark especially if you have a fondness for animals. His approach is to exploit and reveal the concealed. Not for everyone. But makes me want to venture back to the superb Welcome to the Dollhouse and Happiness (one of his deepest cutting) movies. I'm glad.

B01GU87FNA.title: And the Wiener Is...
B01GU87FNA.text: I'm a big Todd Solondz fan. I also happen to love dogs, so I knew this film was going to push the limits for me. However, even with some of the horrific scenes, Solondz seemed to have a point or message behind it all and that always resonated and transcended the horror. And Solondz always seems to create these imaginary characters that are out-of-this-world, yet completely relatable. Nobody does dark humor quite like him.

B01GU87FNA.title: Tame compared to Solonds' earlier movies, but Devito and ...
B01GU87FNA.text: Tame compared to Solonds' earlier movies, but Devito and Burstyn gave me some big old dark laughs. I wish I was in a theater so other people could hear my creepy laugh.

B01GU87FNA.title: **Clap, Clap, Clap**
B01GU87FNA.text:
Wiener-Dog won't appeal to most sanguine folks. It is startlingly dark and heavily quirky. It's drenched in irony and satire and uses a clever editing technique - the overly-long and dramatic pause that gives much room to the viewer for having a feeling - even multiple feelings - about a matter. And there are several (matters AND pauses) and really great actors.
It's very close to being in a category all its own for me. I liked it.

B01GU87FNA.title: it is rated R so no one should be mistaking this for a fun kids movie
B01GU87FNA.text: Definitely not for everyone.  Also, definitely not a kids movie, but then again, it is rated R so no one should be mistaking this for a fun kids movie.  It's very dark, but if you appreciate this kind of film you will recognize that the writer/director is experimenting here.  It helps if you start the movie at an emotional medium level, but an emotional high would be better because it might bring you down.  I liked it though, watch it if you like dark comedies.

B01GU87FNA.title: One of those quiet quirky movies that I liked but would be hard pressed to recommend because it's ...
B01GU87FNA.text: One of those quiet quirky movies that I liked but would be hard pressed to recommend because it's totally a matter of personal taste and it's not exciting. Great slice of life, character study material. Separate vignettes, not plot driven. Great acting throughout. Complaint: when the dog has diarrhea, they waste too much camera time on the doo.

B01GU87FNA.title: Faithful to director's film legacy
B01GU87FNA.text: Being familiar with the director's previous films I was expecting a very slanted view of life. And that's what I got. It's not a pleasant or happy film but one which won't be soon forgotten.

B01GU87FNA.title: Happy holidays!
B01GU87FNA.text: I haven't laughed in earnest for maybe three weeks, and this movie made me laugh long and hard. It also made me cover my eyes, and get tears in them. Yes, it's bleak, but unless you are too young/numb/arrogant to feel you've lost anything of value to these bleak times, or to time itself, you'll get it, and you'll appreciate it. Happy holidays!

B01GU87FNA.title: A Small Film With A Big Impact
B01GU87FNA.text: This is a great independent film.  It has the cute dachshund factor but it is really about the three different living situations and people involved.  The performances and character development are a rare combination of depth, diversity and each with a lot of issues (which does not pertain to everyone).  Give this a chance and I am sure you will not be disappointed--poignant, sad with a lot of humor (some dark) mixed together seamlessly.

B01GU87FNA.title: Granted, it's not for everyone but it does not ...

B01GU87FNA.title: I thought it was interesting and sweet, albeit weird

B01GU87FNA.title: Heartbreaking!
B01GU87FNA.text: Well written, well acted. Very real and depressing. It shows a dog's view on life. It shows unfortunately how people treat animals. Being a animal lover it was hard to watch, but a very well made picture, which touched my heart, because we have a paralyzed wiener dog, a rescue Rat Terrier Chihuahua and a rescue part Chihuahua and Dachshund mix.

B01GU87FNA.title: Life's beauty encompasses more then joy, more then love
B01GU87FNA.text:
I am unsure why this most humanistic and compelling film has been generally rated so poorly; this fact is something I find almost disconcerting. Life's beauty encompasses more then joy, more then love, but death and struggle as well. For beauty is always born from fire and senseless as that pain may seem, it is something that should be recognized. Even, perhaps cherished for the value it offers to the whole of it all.
I really enjoyed this film!

B01GU87FNA.title: Solondz Is A Genius And The Truth Hurts
B01GU87FNA.text: Todd Solondz's approach to dark humor is that in order to get to the supposed humor you must travel through the dark forest that is the American Psyche. And once you've arrived, you may not even feel like laughing. It may be more of a very faint chuckle and the words "Oh my God" as you realize you've met these people before. They're the estranged Aunts and Cousins, those exes you really wish you wouldn't have dated, your own Mother. But this is Solondz's speciality: taking us on a detailed tour of the underbelly of the American Experience.

B01GU87FNA.title: you'll love it. If you're unsure whether to watch it ...
B01GU87FNA.text: I agree with the other positive reviews. If you're a Todd Solondz fan, you'll love it. If you're unsure whether to watch it or not because you've never seen any of his movies before, start with Welcome to the Dollhouse. Wiener-Dog features the two main characters from Welcome to the Dollhouse all grown up so it's worth watching first just for that. It's also a great movie. So glad I ignored the low rating and gave this one a chance.

B00RHRJR76.title: Watch Kaptara!
B00RHRJR76.text: I love Kaptara.  I reminds me of growing up in the early 60's with Sinbad and Jason and the Argonauts.  There's a real story with integrity and honor.  It shows friendship and loyalty.  It also has drama and courage.

B00RHRJR76.title: What a fun movie!
B00RHRJR76.text: Kaptara is an awesome blend of ancient mythology and horror, with a cool dash of steampunk thrown in to really make this a unique and exciting film. The animation isn't perfect, but the story is so compelling that you're drawn in so completely that you stop noticing. And the minotaur was scary enough to have me jumping out of my seat... more than once. If stories of ancient Greece—like 300, Immortals, and Hercules—are you're thing, than  give Kaptara a try. You won't be disappointed!

B00RHRJR76.title: but it was a fun and entertaining movie
B00RHRJR76.text:
While far from a masterpiece, it has a certain charm. Of course the graphics, animations and some of the audio was off, but it was a fun and entertaining movie.

If you look at the short credits, a lot of the aforementioned knocks can be forgiven. Bravo to the small crew that made this movie!

B00RHRJR76.title: But if you like independent non-cartoony animation movies- you can't go wrong with ...
B00RHRJR76.text:
'Kaptara' is a pure Indie production. So it's not fair to compare the CG with -let's say- the latest Pixar movie. The story wants sometimes too much and the focus is lost. But if you like independent non-cartoony animation movies- you can't go wrong with Kaptara.
I especially enjoyed the Minotaur. Great character- watch his fingers/toes..:)

The actors seemed uncomfortable in their characters and with the mono and dialog. The cinematography was first rate. The rest seemed like a college project. Wonder how it got funded? Daddy?

Maybe next time . . . .

B00V0IUG5U.title: Psychological Thriller.
B00V0IUG5U.text: Rachael is very depressed after being unable to produce a baby. Her husband has divorced her and she lost her job because of drinking.  She rides to "work" each day pretending that she is still employed.  Staring out the window she sees a happy couple and fantasizes about them.  When the girl disappears, Rachael inserts herself into the investigation, giving the police a reason to believe she is somehow involves.  It is a page turner!

B00V0IUG5U.title: This is an excellent psychological thriller with many twists and turns
B00V0IUG5U.text: This is an excellent psychological thriller with many twists and turns .  It was a very suspenseful plot  with an excellent cast.  My husband and I would recommend  this film to all lovers of psychological thrillers.

B08J98LGPS.title: Where is PETA!!  This is a HORROR film!!

And, if you're a Dachshund owner, it's human torture. I'll spare the details, as others have written about them - and honestly I can't bring myself to do so. If I could rate this negative stars, I would.  Instead, I'll recommend watching The Ugly Dachshund with Dean Jones and Suzanne Pleshette for a fun and happy story, where dogs are treated well!
