B00BAQZCY2.text: I can't even watch the movie because I ordered it from Europe and I'm in the United States.  So, I have to give the purchase a 1...the movie itself is a 5.  But now I have to find a US version and spend another $20 just to watch this movie here.

B009LSKHKA.title: Trainwreck
B009LSKHKA.text: Tobey Maguire's character is loathsome.  Funny at points, yes, but not enough to offset the disgust.  Ray Liotta has one amazing scene.  Overall a waste of time that I somehow can't stop watching.

B009LSKHKA.title: Preposterous drivel - I want the hour of my life back.
B009LSKHKA.text: I couldn't even finish this movie. This is just preposterous drivel. At no point did I feel sympathy, or like, the main character. He goes from feeling guilty about emailing cam girls to cheating on his wife multiple times in a week, wtf? At no point did I laugh. None of the characters were believable or interesting. There have been good movies about suburban/family life sadness and discontent; this is not one of them. If you want a dark comedy about a slightly depressed suburban dad, watch "American Beauty."

B07Z5GKVK2.title: The older amazing actress had nothing to work with
B07Z5GKVK2.text: The only good thing was the older lady. she was amazing. I only watched because her performance was captivating.  I hope she gets better work.  The actual movie had so much potential.  But it was so boring, it was painful.

B07Z5GKVK2.title: Well???
B07Z5GKVK2.text:
I watched the trailer & I thought, "YESSSSS! A scary, creepy movie!" That is EXACTLY what I was looking for! I would good the movie a "6" on a "1~10" scale. Personally, it wasn't worth the money! 😒
P.S. I still LOVE my
Amazon Prime Movies!
Sincerely,
T. McWilliams
Jefferson, WI.

B07Z5GKVK2.title: Great movie if you're new to this kind of movie
B07Z5GKVK2.text: Could swear that this movie has another name. It's okay if you haven't seen this type of movie before. Otherwise? Average at best. If you're a fan of this style of movie/storytelling, it's an okay movie. If you're looking for a unique experience? Forget about this movie. It's very much a scare by numbers experience.

B00MQNHQTC.title: Not Ragnarok, but entertaining nonetheless
B00MQNHQTC.text: A good tale, and well done despite some very predictable plot twists.  What really surprised me, though, was how weakly this Norwegian film was tied to the traditional myth of Ragnarok, almost trying to explain it away.  I would have hoped for more, but that would have been a different movie.

B00MQNHQTC.title: Well.. Er..
B00MQNHQTC.text: Okay, first it is not in English. I apparently didn't see that written anywhere. I love subtitles so I was fine. Beautiful locations! About the best thing about it... But how is that related to Ragnarok?? Don't waste your time.. Watching the television show Vikings is 100% better

B00MQNHQTC.title: NO HEMSWORTH? LAME, SILLY, DON'T BUY THE HYPE BUY ANOTHER MOVIE INSTEAD !!!
B00MQNHQTC.text: HEMSWORTH DOES NOT APPEAR IN THIS FILM IF SO A (VERY VERY MINOR CAMEO APPEARANCE) SOMEWHERE IN THE BEGINNING -- THIS FILM IS SNAKE OIL :-( 1:36 MINUTES OF WASTED TIME !!!

B00MQNHQTC.title: Mythic Monster
B00MQNHQTC.text:
An archaeologist decides to go on a search only he believes in ... with his children.
What could possibly go wrong?
Quite a lot, as it turns out.
The film is well-done, the characters are memorable, there are villains about, we go into a cave, and ... then things get /really/ exciting.
And he finally discovers what the runes mean!

B00MQNHQTC.title: If it wasn't predictable, it would have been a really good movie
B00MQNHQTC.text: Would I pay $7 again? No. Maybe $4. The few panoramas of sweden was nice, and filmed in a beautiful setting. Acting, production, effects was good. Predictability of the story line made the movie a little boring unfortunately. But if you want to just get something OK to pass the time, this film is probably at the upper end of most 3 stars rated movies.

B00MQNHQTC.title: FAIRLY GOOD ADVENTURE MOVIE.
B00MQNHQTC.text: Prepare for subtitles, but movie is good and follows reality to a further point than some of this type of fantasy/adventure. Archaeology buffs may like it. Female lead has an unusual role.  Entertaining.

B00MQNHQTC.title: The story line was fun and for anyone with children who like a little ...
B00MQNHQTC.text:
This was certainly a family friendly film that gave the audience some "basic" understanding around Norse Mythology. In some ways it reminded my of Jurassic park. The violence in the movie is "mild" which is not surprising given it's PG-13 rating. Personally I would have preferred something much more Viking or Norse-esque.

The story line was fun and for anyone with children who like a little adventure this is a great one to share.

David Roach, Independent Author of the "Marauder Series"
Web Page - http://marauderseries.blogspot.com/
The Books - http://www.amazon.com/gp/bookseries/B019SCYN26

B00MQNHQTC.title: Foreign creature
B00MQNHQTC.text: Fairly interesting family movie. Listening to a soundtrack was recorded in Norwegian gave it a little something extra because I  am not familiar with the way it sounds.  I like creatures in my movies so that was a big plus. I would recommend this if you want to watch a movie some lazy afternoon.

B00MQNHQTC.title: Tabitha Shay's Reviews.
B00MQNHQTC.text: I was so disappointed in this movie. I'd watched the trailer and from what I saw, thought it's be a great movie...It could have been so much more. The little dab of romance you're led to believe will develop fizzles out. Worst of all, no one speaks English, so you're reading the lines all the way through the movie, which is something I hate doing. (My personal pet peeve). What little back story that's told is also a bit of a disappointment.

B00MQNHQTC.title: Ragnarok-Reptilicus
B00MQNHQTC.text: One won't find anything more in this Norwegian film than one would normally expect to find in a SyFy channel "made-for-cable" production except perhaps the "subtitles." One gets the sense that this is the updated, CGI Norwegian version of the old, hokey Danish flick, "Reptilicus." The only consolation is that at least, even with mediocre CGI effects, Ragnarok-Reptilicus doesn't look like a puppet with "strings."

B08DK66KLR.title: I was hoping for a screen adaptation of such an important figures works
B08DK66KLR.text:
Having read a few works on the life of Marie Curie, I am not certain why the director chose to portray her as such a narcissistic and selfish individual. The characters standoffish attitude detracts from the meaningful works that the real life individual accomplished.
Pacing of the film was weird. The film spent an exorbitant amount of time on future nuclear disasters and atomic weapons. A LOT of time.
Over all I cannot say that I enjoyed the film and would not recommend it to others.

B08DK66KLR.title: Took one of pillars of science and told very little of her actual life.
B08DK66KLR.text: Why can't Amazon, Netflix, and other streaming services make something without the need to change all the facts and "add" to their story. Keep your politics and opinions out of your shows and present the honest facts. Pure and simple.

B08DK66KLR.title: Horrible and a dishonor to science and Marie Curie
B08DK66KLR.text: This is a horrible movie and a disagrace to Marie Curie's memory. It has no rhyme or reason, jumps around from topic to another with no sense. Instead of focusing on the science and all the outcomes of it (good or bad), it overdramatizes her life and takes away from her years of work and research. Wish I had never seen it.

B08DK66KLR.title: Horrible
B08DK66KLR.text:
This movie is a horrible depiction of a tremendously important piece of history. Intertwining the discovery of radioactivity with segments depicting Hiroshima and Chernobyl is pointless and smacks of a political agenda.

This movie is what you get when you mix physics with a social agenda.

B08DK66KLR.title: Trippy Attempt
B08DK66KLR.text: I was really excited that there was a mainstream movie about such an important historical scientist. However, it feels like they were trying to be so innovative with how they portrayed things that it's hard to follow, even to the point where I'm not sure things made sense at times. It's ok for what the creators were going for I suppose, but it's not something I'd really recommend to anyone else. We did make it all the way through the movie, but there were several points where we considered just cutting it off and not finishing it.

B08DK66KLR.title: Disappointed they went nowhere
B08DK66KLR.text: Disappointed  marie curie is one of the most famous people in history but you would not know that by watching this movie you see what people in  The past the future do with radioactivity but a very disjointed look at snippets of her life 2 min here 5 min there with interruptions  of time jumps of her then her husband and other people and places in time

B08DK66KLR.title: Bad romance film using famous historical figures
B08DK66KLR.text: This movie is a disgrace to Mme Curie’s life. Her scientific accomplishments are glossed over or ignored. This is basically a bad romance movie using notorious historical figures in an attempt to make the movie interesting. The contributions to science and women in science that Mme. Curie made deserve more recognition than what this movie provided. I am very disappointed in this saccharine, dull film. The 2 stars  I provided are for the poor actors who did their best with a bad script and worse direction.

B08DK66KLR.title: Time I will never get back
B08DK66KLR.text: Horrible through and through.  We stopped watching it and just let it run.  Really dumb!  You are trying to connect this to Hiroshima.  Seriously.  Hiroshima saved lives.  Bullchips of a movie.

B08DK66KLR.title: Convoluted mess
B08DK66KLR.text: This movie had so much potential.  I had such high hopes for learning something about history.  All this movie did was make me hate an important woman in our past.  Too bad it couldn't have taught us more about what she did.

B08DK66KLR.title: Actress made it better than it is
B08DK66KLR.text: This movie paints her as…idk…I get movies are based on certain events, but even that didn’t show Einstein made the Atom Bomb. Does the director hate women to gloss over that? Pike did amazing for what she had. But, it’s just horrible the writers think she’s to blame for the atom bomb, when it’s clear it’s her work that started Einstein down the journey.

B08DK66KLR.title: This movie was a lost opportunity to tell the life story of a scientific pioneer.
B08DK66KLR.text:
If you knew nothing of the Curies, this movie would have you believe that they invented radiation and are responsible for the atomic bomb and the accident at chernobyl.  There is so much nonsense shown with zero correlation to the work of the curies.
This movie was a lost opportunity to tell the life story of a scientific pioneer.  The acting and the period sets were good, hence the two stars.

B08DK66KLR.title: Woman bashing disguised as praise
B08DK66KLR.text: This movie is just bad. It’s marketed a period piece, celebrating women in the scientific field, just to drag you along showing all the “evils” it has been used for or accidents that happened since then. The author and director did everything but say it was Marie’s fault it all happened. Maybe their next movie will be about the discovery of the wheel with a lot of car accident shots to show how bad the discovery really was and whom we can blame for all it.

B08DK66KLR.title: Couldn’t make it through it
B08DK66KLR.text: A lot of reviews are talking about inaccuracies. That by itself isn’t the biggest problem. It’s just uninteresting. I stopped watching it and never had any desire to finish it. Nothing about it holds any interest. It feels like an amateur effort.

B08DK66KLR.title: Interesting but flawed
B08DK66KLR.text: I like that this film highlighted her accomplishments, but there was far too much dramatic fluff rather than concentrating on the substance of her work and accomplishments. In that respect this film was a missed opportunity.

B08DK66KLR.title: Tried to be too many things
B08DK66KLR.text: I stopped watching this after about 40 minutes.  The storyline was all over the place (flashbacks, fast forward to 1957, science, misogyny), and honestly, do we really need to see them lying naked on a riverbank?

B08DK66KLR.title: Slow But Interesting
B08DK66KLR.text:
AMAZON PRIME VIDEO

I'm not sure of the accuracy of the details portrayed here, but this production appears to make an interesting telling of the majority of the life of Madame Curie.

The acting is quite believable, and the sets are excellent. I liked how they skipped forward in time to depict both highly positive and highly negative results of the discovery of radioactivity.

The movie is paced rather slowly, and at times bends towards being a soap opera. It does a nice job of blending science and the human element.

3.5 STARS

B08DK66KLR.title: It's a good overview and general representation of her life
B08DK66KLR.text: I think it will help people who don't know about her, know more than they did. Hopefully it will raise curiosity and encourage young women to dig deeper. What a life and gift she was.

B08DK66KLR.title: Great performances
B08DK66KLR.text: The casting was excellent and the actors were superb. The artistic design of the film, although beautiful, was a but choppy leading to dramatic scenes that, although very cool to watch, seemed out of place. But I really liked the film regardless and I don't think I will forget it.

B08DK66KLR.title: Not the best film but really good otherwise
B08DK66KLR.text: it was a good look into how a single discovery can lead to so many results... and a good look into her life and how she was...hopefully its accurate ...but it was enjoyable...additionally she was a bit of a hero to me when i was growing up ...knowing the world then wasn't attuned to women of knowledge... she scared men... and that's good!

B08DK66KLR.title: Compelling story
B08DK66KLR.text: This was a very well done biographical film about arguably the most prominent, if not important, woman in science. The settings were atmospheric and, while sort of dark in filming, captured her uphill battle against an entrenched "boys' club" in the world of science. Rosamund Pike was excellent as Marie Curie. A little slow in places, but the story overcomes that one minor failing. Tragic yet triumphant.

B08DK66KLR.title: Interesting period biopic
B08DK66KLR.text: Rosamund Pike is exceptional here.  The cinematography, costume, and set design were very well done. It was well-paced, although as some others have noted, some of the flash forwards take you out of the flow momentarily.

B08DK66KLR.title: Not a movie I'd normally pick...
B08DK66KLR.text: However, I am pleasantly surprised and enjoyed it. Intrigued by the story and loved the acting. Didn't care much the flash forwards. Normally I don't mind but, in this movie it didn't do it for me. Other than that I like the movie!

B08DK66KLR.title: Revealing and educational
B08DK66KLR.text: History books don't give you the kind of perspective her story deserves as the director weaves this cinematographic perspective of one of the world's most significant scientist - bravo Madame Curie!

B08DK66KLR.title: FIVE STARS ALL THE WAY!!
B08DK66KLR.text: What a very romantic and inspirational movie that is based on a true story that I have seen in a while!!  I love, Marie Curie!!  Such an amazing woman, and Pierre her beloved is an amazing man who knows how to love his woman!!  ❤🤙

B08DK66KLR.title: speechless
B08DK66KLR.text: With great inventions and discoveries, no matter what they are, there is ALRWAYs some loss.  The acting is excellent, the ability to portray that kind of love is WAY beyond the intellect of some.  Well done!

B08DK66KLR.title: Madame Curie: A Pioneer in Radioactivity
B08DK66KLR.text: The film, Radioactive, was an excellent portrayal of the scientist, Marie Curie (The first woman to win two Nobel Prizes).  Her discovery of Radium and Polonium led to groundbreaking research in physics and chemistry; this includes cancer treatment, x-rays, and more. Conversely, the moral and ethical implications of its impact on Hiroshima/Nagasaki in August of 1945 were devastating -- Polar opposites for sure!  Radioactive was an excellent movie and I found Rosamund Pike to be outstanding in her role as Madame Curie, A Pioneer in Radioactivity!

B08DK66KLR.title: A Complex Look at a Complex Woman
B08DK66KLR.text: Marie in this movie is as driven, undeterred, tenacious, and determined as she appeared to have been in life. The acting is fine, although the characters might have been presented with a bit more depth. The movie itself provides an orderly retelling of Marie's life that at times feels as methodical as she likely was. I give the movie five stars for its faithful presentation of a great, important figure of both history and science.

B08DK66KLR.title: Celebration of women
B08DK66KLR.text: If I knew of her discovery but I never knew just how wonderful they were the whole family including her daughter winning Nobel prize herself this is an excellent movie I don't understand all of the artistic images but all in all of this movie is gripping and it is beautiful love story as well as science I recommend everybody should watch it

B08DK66KLR.title: Great insight
B08DK66KLR.text: Great insight on the almost comical but sad misunderstanding of radium in its early discovery. Like many things though, they did not give up trying to find useful applications despite the dangers and now we are able to benefit from their hard work. It's amazing what she was able to accomplish.

B08DK66KLR.title: A Woman at work
B08DK66KLR.text: This movie is a must see, I don't know why many people gave it bad reviews but, I loved it. This movie in my own opinion was action packed from beginning to end, it's a true story wrapped in a love story about science, many people wanted to see Albert Einstein in the movie but, I thought that would have taken the spotlight off of her. I would not mind seeing it again, I am very happy with this movie. 5 Stars!!!

B08DK66KLR.title: Hail women. Worth a watch.
B08DK66KLR.text:
Great movie, definitely worth a watch. Though it has some broken elements
(pun.. if you take it in context of the movie!), mainly when it shows the uses of radioactivity. A small description would have helped because otherwise it took me away from the movie to a parallel window where I typed in the dates to see what they're actually showing. So, other than the flow, the movie is likable, a woman making her way within a then man's world, and with what greatness! Applauds!

B08DK66KLR.title: impressive and insightful
B08DK66KLR.text: Being a radiation imaging technologist, i have seek history of radiation and the industry . This film is well done to the challenges and abilities of a genius.....even today her ideas are used...she was the first to provide mobile X-ray machines ....we are using this technology with COVID patients. I truly enjoyed this film

B08DK66KLR.title: Depicted the full scope of Curie as a person and radioactivity as applied for both good and evil.
B08DK66KLR.text: Depicted Curie in the full scope of her personhood, without getting excessively deep into any one area. I loved it. Other reviewers say it time jumped into the future, and it did, in very related ways. She had insight that radiation could also be used for evil, and it showed that.

B08DK66KLR.title: amazing
B08DK66KLR.text: Unfortunately, I didn't know much about Madame Curie, and learned so much from this movie, especially the difficulty being a woman of science had to deal with in the late 1800's, early 1900's. The acting was excellent, and I thoroughly enjoyed this movie! Thank you Amazon!

B08DK66KLR.title: Entertaining piece of history
B08DK66KLR.text: I thought this title was going to be a boring piece of part history and part fiction, but even though all movies have a high percentage of fiction and less reality towards the history, this one was amazing, I was all the way entertained.  It has good drama moments and it transport the viewer to the epoch and the ways the society behaved in that period of time, If you are a good history/drama/etc buff, this one is going to be great for you!!!  Rosemond Pike did a brilliant representation of madame Curie!!

B06WWJH49V.title: No!
B06WWJH49V.text: There were a few seconds of this trying to go somewhere, but it's really a disaster of a pilot. Unicorns have a lower suspension of disbelief than this. The characters are one dimensional caricatures, unrealistic and unbelievable. There is no substance to it, nothing funny, no social commentary underneath it all. Just random nonsense. The Dio shirt was probably its best part :)

B06WWJH49V.title: Can't wait to see the complete season.
B06WWJH49V.text: I rarely write reviews but when I finally get to see and hear creative writing and production, I have to take the time and thank the people who are responsible for their amazing imagination and creativity for this show (and of course the actors). Can't wait to see the complete season and future seasons.

B082LTWDKD.title: Absolute garbage
B082LTWDKD.text: Looks like the Secret Life of Pets right!? Right guys!? How can the acting be this bad in an animation? How? Why would Amazon put this on my recommended list? Time! I can't get back my time!

B082LTWDKD.title: Wish we had known this was a Chinese movie from the start
B082LTWDKD.text: This was a cute movie, but there were lots of little things that we found strange or confusing. There was nothing on the page where one selects the movie to indicate its country of origin, and the language was listed as English. All the voices sounded American, so we assumed that it was an American movie (apparently it was just good dubbing). I think we would have liked the movie better if we hadn't gone in with a bunch of incorrect cultural expectations.

B082LTWDKD.title: Do not let your children watch this!!!
B082LTWDKD.text: This is not appropriate for children. It is a morbid, dark and almost gruesome cartoon. I had to explain to my child why someone would put a cat in a bag and send it into a fire. WTF?

B082LTWDKD.title: Not appropriate for kids; Promotes violence and animal abuse
B082LTWDKD.text: One scene only, as an example: showing a kitten being slammed between two concrete blocks, then stuffed into a plastic bag and placed on a conveyor belt with garbage heading into an incinerator with a roaring fire.  Have never written a review for a movie, ever, but this one deserved it.  Honestly shocked this movie was even made and that it was made so recently in 2020.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Uninspired, Meh, sadly predictable
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I can’t believe I wasted my time watching this garbage. The “judges” have questionable taste which can be seen even in their own excessive attire. So it’s no surprise they chose a winner whose designs are not wearable. If you run a season 4 I’ll take a hard pass..

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Upside Down Pants?
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Who will wear Yannik's clothing designs. They are not flattering. They look uncomfortable. The designer who is the most outlandish seems to win. Other designers on the show had better designs and ideas. Sorry - This is the last season on Making the Cut that I will watch.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Dated and Unnecessary
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Do we really need outdated views of runway and ‘show stoppers?’. This genre has fun it’s course. So have Heidi and Tim (and Jeremy). The good things are the designers talent and passion (and Nicole). The rest seems like I’m back in 2003.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Favoritism was very evident
B0B5HP8KC5.text: It's truly sad that judges showed their favoritism from the beginning. There were so many talented designers this season, and the winner was the designer with the less wearable clothing. Judges only wanted the drama and never thought about the real customer.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: This season was a disappointment:-(
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
This season was awful! I’ve been a faithful viewer from the beginning. Jeremy needs to go!! His behavior was ridiculous and Nicole’s mouth is filthy!
The wrong designer won! I’m sorry, but if someone walked down the street with a pair of pants on upside down and a mask with eyelashes I would run!
I love Tim!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: A Bit Sadistic!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: S. 3, Eps. 1 -  Emily should not have been eliminated! That skirt was so sweet and amazing that she created! May she find success! I feel like the contestants are being exploited. Heidi is demonic... Her, Tim and the other male (Jeremy?) are too old to know what works for today's fashion industry and unfortunately, this is show is more about politics and show business than really giving any of these designers a chance to succeed!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Designs are strange
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I have seen all Project Runways and loved Making the Cut 1 and 2. There were ups and downs during Season 3. Lannik's final runway was the worst fashion I have seen. I enjoyed his personality and some of his designs. However, his final runway was so strange  I felt it was a insult for the program. Naked bottoms and headless models is not fashion just strange. Sad I am not looking for any future Seasons.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: The Winner Dresses Women Like They're Boxes
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I feel the judges aren't really looking at the clothes from the audience's perspective...it seems the more bizarre the clothes, the more likely that designer will be chosen. Yannik didn't make a single piece of clothing that would make a woman look good. They sent several designer's home that really wowed me. But if you can't make upside down pants then you can't win this contest.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: The Worst Season.
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I fully understand need for concept in fashion. The winner created garbage fashion. I will eat my word if I suddenly  see people dressed up with pants as shirts and costumes that belong at Halloween Horror Nights.  My understanding is the clothing must actually sell. Very disappointed. Really was a big joke.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Talentless, uncreative, visionless fashion
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I would never wear anything the winner created, the fact that you think is fashion forward is disheartening. What an absolutely disappointment and a blond disrespect for fashion, a pair of pants turn into a dress, a dress made out of sleeves I’s consider talent, speechless a million dollars to create what?

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Out of touch garbage
B0B5HP8KC5.text: This show belongs on network tv, or more precisely some obscure theme channel.  The hosts are boring and their delivery tired and uninspired.  Zero effort is put into this exhausted format.  It's out of touch to the extreme.  The clothes and guest hosts are silly and amazons attempt to brand off of it sucks the air out of the room.  It's a dead horse with flies.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Absurd
B0B5HP8KC5.text: This season was ridiculous!! The clothes that were wearable and beautiful were not even considered. Then the temper tantrum by Jeremy the judge was embarrassing.  Such a disappointing finale... Who is going to wear Yanick's clothes?? They are bad costumes... Last time I watch Making the Cut...If you haven't started don't waste your time.... I Miss "Project Runway" We need Nina!!!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Terrible abuse and ridiculously out of touch!
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
I have loved watching this show in past, but this season was horrible! Tell me what we are supposed to think watching the wealthy self absorbed excuse for humans set up these designers with unrealistic expectations and then hurl abuse at them when the designer cannot finish things to their satisfaction! And then to choose a winning designer who made not one thing any normal
Person would ever wear??? They were clearing trying to make up for the verbal abuse the poor designer was forced to ensure from Jeremy. SHAME ON YOU JUDGES AND AMAZON.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Shocked by the Winner
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Loved so much of it, until they started cutting the prep time , I would have loved to see them give ample time to finish their ideas without cramping their timetable...I do not agree in any way with the winning choice, yes it was a great art collection, but to me it was more of a joke on true working designers. You CAN blend art and apparel, but this was a hot mess. Just because it reads avante garde doesn't necessarily make it so.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Smug. Rude. Pompous.
B0B5HP8KC5.text: The judges are incredibly rude sometimes. These people forget they are speaking to human beings putting their art out there for critique. Just because someone was rude to you when you were trying to ventral into the fashion industry does not mean you have to act that way. In the first season, the judges were chatting and giggling at peoples stuff. Season 2 was a tad better except for Jeremy Scott. Season 3 is ridiculous. Just because you can be mean doesn’t mean you should. Maybe the judges should all ask themselves, “What would Tim Gunn do?”

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Can't believe it!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I just finished watching the finale and can't really understand what has been the criteria for selecting Yanik as the winner.  Amazon should just think of whom would wear his clothes. Is it for every type of woman? I don't think so. But again what I can't understand is not the judgment of the judges in the selection.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Ok this season
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
I did NOT like Jeremy Scott. I thought his temper tantrum reminded me the "terrible" two's with little children. All the contestants work hard and deserve to be treated with respect.
Love Heidi and Tim Gunn and I wish Tim was a judge with a "floating" judge weekly.
I saw the last episode and was aghast at the winner, nothing wearable at all but the runner up has a mentorship with Amazon and yes he had wearable clothing. Alas those who made beautifully draped and cut clothing got sent home fast. I find this disappointing.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Judges are very opinionated in their personal style
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
I adore Yannik as a person, but the only wearable pieces there are just some tops, he definitely is not designing for an every day person who likes to look good.
Instead, look how Georgia's designs are selling on Amazon! She does listen to the customer/ adjusts and makes the looks sitting on a different sized body

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Not happy with the designs
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I did not like the designs that where shown by the winner really not what you would see on the street. Sad that Gorgia did not win she had an I eye for the every day life of the public. Sad I have watched every season and this is the first time I disagree with the judges. I also did not think Jannell from  Philly was amazing and will contact her for more of her cloths.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Falling flat
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I usually adore these shows (Project Runway & Making the Cut) but the latter is still finding its voice. Tim is classic and smart, as always. The judges sport amazing outfits for one part of the show and then ridiculous looking items during critiques (pajamas and then matching technicolor Alice in Wonderland gone wrong?)  Is it political or an inside joke?  I'm not in on it.  I wanted to see fashion from the judges too...

B0B5HP8KC5.title: They chose the wrong Designer
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I find it so difficult to understand WHY they chose the Designer that they decided on. There were so many beautiful wearable designs by the other designers, and the one that they chose had pieces that MOST people would never consider purchasing. They were pieces of ART, NOT clothes that most people would actually purchase to wear. I love fashion, and would never purchase or wear any of his pieces !

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Winner was predictable
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Don't want to write a spoiler - the winner was predictable. You could tell who the Main Judge wanted to win - so obvious. I am sure the designer is fine - definitely not my style at all. I was disappointed to see how the show played out. Not sure if I will watch another season. Love Tim Gunn though . . . so classy and helpful. Ridiculous timelines too for the designers to produce clothing and then be shot down by it. I don't know . . .

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Jeremy Scott tantrum
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I've watched every making the cut episode and have enjoyed them up until Jeremy Scott outbursts.  His tantrum is unacceptable and inexcusable.  He should be replaced as a judge since he in my opinion presents a spoiled brat attitude and does not have positive ways to critic or help the designers.  I am extremely disappointed.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Totally messed up
B0B5HP8KC5.text: This is one of my fav shows.  I cant stop watching.  I cry… a lot.  The Amazon influence is so overwhelming and overbearing.  I feel like the judges are ALL over the place now with their critiques because of it and it’s really confusing to the designer.  I also am so disappointed by the Amanzon versions of making the cut.  Love Amazon but it’s too much!!!!  Let the artists live their best lives!!!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Horrible ending
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
Not once did the swiss designer show wearable fashion. Sad. Strongly disagree with the ending. Georgia Jeanette Rafael deserved to win more. I understand yanniks sob story of not finding funding but theres a reason why no one wanted to fund that. Doesnt mean he deserves a million dollars for that unimaginative collection.
I wouldve bought most of geogias clothes and is everyone forgetting the amazing gowns by Jeanette in the beginning the gold black statements with head pieces i mean that was unbelievably good.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Idea for next season
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Let's lock Jeremy Scott in a room with a sewing machine, a seamstress (Isn't there a non-sexist word for that yet? But I digress.), some bolts of fabric and sewing notions, and make him come up with 2 outfits in 24 hours. Have a judges panel made up of past contestants who had the pleasure of being judged by him.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: This gives me my fashion fix
B0B5HP8KC5.text: The pandemic impacted fashion so much that I am not too critical of anything that  comes along and Heidi and Tim are enjoyable. Heidi should have left her face alone. It is a bit hard to look at, and it seems to me that there are not many close-ups. I know she is not averse to having work done, but she is a beautiful woman and I would have liked to see her age more naturally. She has been a promoter of accepting diverse body sizes in models. Why not accept aging?

B0B5HP8KC5.title: I remember the Runway show and this one seems less showy
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Based on Ep 1, I  liked that they have international designers.  I miss the tension of the first show, the way the designers were jealous of each other and running around trying to beat deadlines.  I hope it gets more tense with upcoming episodes.  And I agreed with the choice of Sienna from NY.  She made evening wear.  Heidi must give us her beauty secrets.  The woman never ages.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Fun for the whole dam fam
B0B5HP8KC5.text: watched with my daughter. It's a fun, creative show. My daughter loves fashion art and she was inspired by the contestants. We both thought that Jeremy could have cooled it on the outburst - calm down sweetie - it's just fashion! Tim a doll and Heidi is a great host. The clothes are probably awful in person, but whatever...byeeeeeee

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Love the Designers
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
I absolutely love Making the Cut. I stared at the screen for the two episodes and hardly blinked.
I wanted more when it was done. I have become attached to the designers and love their creations.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: All about the clothes
B0B5HP8KC5.text: So far, Season Three has been all about the clothes, and that's exactly the way it should be! You can't spend enough time showing how the outfits come together and then parading them on the runway.  I like it when the judges take a close look at the clothes to check on their construction. Sometimes they forget to focus on the fashion.  They're making the right decisions about the contestants, too.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Great season, WRONG winner
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
I love the show format, and I love Heidi, Tim and Nicole. Jeremy has got to go, especially after his toddler tantrum. Rafael should have won, not one-note Yannik. His entire collection, to me, was more avant garde and not at all wearable. I cannot believe they chose him over Rafael. Very disappointed. I loved Georgia and Jeannette - Georgia spoke to all body sizes and her clothes were very wearable.
Bring Back Zac Posen to replace Jeremy PLEASE!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: MTC 3 .... loved it! However......
B0B5HP8KC5.text: ...... Jeremy Scott's hissy fit, was that directed or spontaneous? If the latter, then he needs to be held accountable for extreme unprofessionalism. There are many ways to express disappointment maturely and throwing a temper tantrum is not one of them. But then again, maybe it was 'staged' to make for 'good TV'; guess I'll never know.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Heidi and Tim take us through a fun romp in the fashion industry
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I enjoyed how extremely talented all the designers were this season. I've seen other reviews that criticized the lack of wearable items. The fashion-as-art designers kept the series really interesting for me. I was truly engaged.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Not as expected
B0B5HP8KC5.text: The winner is certainly in a different worl/era. Hope he can relate to the rest of us and  focus his talent and imagination to make more elegant and casual clothes.  Host and judges except for Jeremy are good.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Much better than season 1 and 2
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Season 3 is so much better than season 1 and 2.  So far I am enjoying not only the fashions, but also the "cutting room" floor interplay. The designers themselves are of a much better quality than the prior 2 seasons also.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Show was great, the winner was not
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Picked that winner for WHAT? I would have given the show 5 stars, but there was so much more talent there than he ever had. The runner up had it in the bag (literally), she should be really upset. He didn't deserve to win. I wasted all that time!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Interesting designs
B0B5HP8KC5.text: The show is promising and jumps right into the design elements. I get that international feel in the format which is good. I would like to see more of Tim, he delivers style and grace every time. And of course Hedi looks gorgeous. But, MORE TIM please!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: obsessed with making the cut
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
Could this show be anymore fun? The clothes are impressive and I cannot wait to see who wins! I have my eye on who I hope is the winner!
I really want the first "high fashion" look from the first episode!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Loved it!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I've only watched the 1st episode. Love the designers and each of their unique abilities! My creativity was so stimulated! A bit concerned though... To me, Tim looked so nervous, out of place, sometimes his voice quivered and his hands shook. He seemed distracted, not "in" the moment. Tim Gunn, hope all is well...

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Really, Amazon?  You spoiled the finale in The Drop email!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I love this show.  I’m really not happy about the spoiler in my email description for The Drop.  I wanted to watch the show first to find out who won!  The episodes just came out today, and I understand that you have to sell the winner’s designs (this show is basically a giant commercial lol), but PLEASE leave the winner info to where it doesn’t show in the email description!  I didn’t even open the email.  Spoilers like that ruin the fun of watching the show and rooting for your favorite designer!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Love it!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I absolutely love Heidi Klum and Tim Gunn (always have, always will 😁) but I also love the entire show. It’s always a fun journey and I enjoy it way more than I should.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Talented designers!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I love watching Making the Cut. So many talented designers and beautiful clothing that somehow did not translate well into the store this year. Seriously disappointed by who they chose as the winner in the finale. While they are very artistic and creative with their collection there was nothing truly that I would have felt comfortable in. The judges chose high concept over high fashion. Bring on next year.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: fabulous creative show
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I love the teaming of Heidi and Tim. I like that they are changing the rules as to direction of the show and the challenges.  They have very talented competitors!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Talent Never Ceases To Amaze
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I'm not a fashion designer, but a creative myself; I have watched every season twice and the level of talent and passion these designers have is inspiring in itself.  Love the selection of judges and guest judges, so much fun.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Just a delightful show. Love it!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Just a delightful show for all inspiring artist and art lovers.  Heidi and Tim are the best and we just can't wait for next the episodes and seasons to come great job. Keep it going!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Best Fashion Competition Yet!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I loved how they mixed it up, didn't rely on the same old format. Also thought this was the best crop of designers so far - including all the years of Runway - except for Mr Siriano of course!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Loving this season!
B0B5HP8KC5.text: I'm a long-time fan of clothing design competition shows, and after the first two seasons I wasn't sure I'd watch this one anymore. I'm glad I gave it a chance! Episode four was especially entertaining and the designs are so fresh and imaginative. Tons of fun!

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Creative and Forward-Thinking
B0B5HP8KC5.text: Not sure why this has such bad reviews. I think this series is a lot of fun, showcasing a lot of incredible international talent with challenges that push the designers. Some really forward thinking designs, gender inclusive/gender fluid, chic and creative designs.

B0B5HP8KC5.title: Enjoyable to watch, makes me love the world of fashion, plus Heidi & Tim <3
B0B5HP8KC5.text:
I enjoy the pacing of the show, love the passion and artistry of the designers, and I adore Heidi and Tim. Good diversity and interesting locations. The pop-up stores give the viewer a better understanding of the designers' point of view.

Looking forward to season 4!

B07BKQZ9GQ.title: A failed reanimation movie
B07BKQZ9GQ.text:
This movie starts off with an interesting premise, moves quickly to reanimating a human, and then implodes under the weight of confusing plot and backstory.

Theres just too much going on here that stretches credulity—- even in a movie about bringing the dead to life.

A simpler, cleaner plot with ramifications taking place outside the sole sole setting (A dark laboratory) would have been better.

Its a shame. Sometimes less is more.

B07BKQZ9GQ.title: Don't waste your time-pure trash!
B07BKQZ9GQ.text: Absolute garbage...unless you like cheesy horror films with all the same old hackneyed plot and visual devices.  I wish I could give it 1/10 of a star! (Oh wait...no I believe it deserves a ~ zero ~ star rating)  This has NOTHING at all to do with the excellent Frank Herbert Sci-Fi novel of the same name.

B07BKQZ9GQ.title: Goes for the cheap thrills about 1/2 way through
B07BKQZ9GQ.text:
The first half of this movie The Lazarus Effect is intriguing. Then it goes in to the schlocky 'Steven King / Wes Craven' mire. Going for shock effects and 'horror' - all of which we've seen before, and before that.
Too bad; A better writer could have turned that promising beginning into new territory.
2 stars for effort.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Plot never hooked me.
B00HR0P9XE.text: This one just dragged on. The acting was good, and there's great use of camera effects for viewer disorientation. But the plot just never hooked me. Not for a second.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Love it or hate it
B00HR0P9XE.text: This is one of those love it or hate it movies...I happen to love it. The reasons people might hate it; it's slow,it's in blk and wht, and it doesn't make a lot of sense. The reasons I found that I loved it; it was interesting,kept me guessing, great acting, unusual in it's filming and it filled out my collection of 'trippy movies' nicely.😵😜

B00HR0P9XE.title: What a pile of crap
B00HR0P9XE.text:
What starts out looking like a good period piece quickly becomes a pretentious, plot-less, rambling crapfest of epic proportions.
It is beautifully filmed (in black and white, 'cos their so cool); the camerawork is flawless; too bad about the rest of the film.

B00HR0P9XE.title: I honestly can't even tell you why I love it, but I did
B00HR0P9XE.text: Woah! As a long time film fan, I have to say that I was begrudgingly coaxed into watching this film after a friend heard mixed reviews of it. This is by far one of the most artistically and existential movies I have seen since, "Moon".  I honestly can't even tell you why I love it, but I did, and I would recommend it to anyone who is tired of the run of the mill Hollywood turn out.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Okeedokee
B00HR0P9XE.text: All these reviews that are so "deep" and articulate and all I seen was a giant drug induced, semi funny, semi confusing movie. If you wanna say wtf did I just watch, then watch this.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Quirky!
B00HR0P9XE.text: I had to watch this twice.  I couldn't understand what they were saying :-).  If only they would speak English.  LOL.  I liked it a lot the first time, but even more when I watched it the second time because I knew what was going on, could understand them better, and had a chance to see the film as a whole.  I would recommend it.  It's weird and sad and funny.  Enjoy!

B00HR0P9XE.title: High on mushrooms and life.
B00HR0P9XE.text: What a great film. The direction is incredibly solid, the creative use of song, vernacular, culture, editing, and history in this film deserves oodles of praise. What a wondrous little gem here. You really can't wrong with this one, it's both hilarious and sentimental at times, belayed by a clear sense of the perverse and comical notions of life in wartime. Absolutely the highest recommendation.

B00HR0P9XE.title: loved it
B00HR0P9XE.text: i loved it. crazy beautiful. with that being said, my boyfriend hated it. to be fair, i like black and white, slow moving, and often in subtitles films. so not everyone's film, just my type of film. acting was top notch, dialogue great. i love reece shearsmith. i rewatched it just a few hours later. still stands up after a rewatch.

B00HR0P9XE.title: but overall it's a decent watch if you like bizarre movies
B00HR0P9XE.text: Interesting movie! The plot is kinda difficult to follow while watching and some of the dialouge is a bit spotty, but overall it's a decent watch if you like bizarre movies. Some of the psychedelia seemed a bit forced but the camera work and editing were great.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Mind Numbingly Dull
B00HR0P9XE.text: Shot in black-and-white, costumed actors wander around a field between the hedgerows talking high-falutin' nonsense.  However, I gave up on this one, so something cinematic might have happened in the latter half of the movie, but I doubt it.  The whole thing struck me a sophomoric attempt to make a European art film.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Excellent
B00HR0P9XE.text: I thought this was a fantastic movie - probably the best movie I've seen since "The Master" (to which it bears no similarity whatsoever).  I suspect this would be best enjoyed by those who also enjoyed, for example, John Crowley's Aegypt Cycle, the academic books of Francis Yates, just about anything by Peter Ackroyd (fiction or non-fiction) and/or have nostalgic feelings about psychedelics.  It was also very well written, acted and filmed, at least in my opinion.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Not for the slack jawed huddled masses
B00HR0P9XE.text: If you are uneducated on subjects concerning the occult, history, psychology, and life I  general don't watch. Most people dislike this movie because like most opiated sheep they want something that has no plot and no depth. If you are actually intellectual and enjoy cerebral art it is a perfect film for you. If your a knuckle dragging moron go watch a Michael Bay movie or something.

B00HR0P9XE.title: Bad, just bad
B00HR0P9XE.text: Quite possibly the worst movie I've ever seen. The persons responsible for making this movie should really be made to personally apologize to everyone who've been exposed and then stand by the highway with a shameful sign.

B00HR0P9XE.title: I had read alot of good reviews of this movie
B00HR0P9XE.text: I had read alot of good reviews of this movie. I also enjoyed both The Kill List and Sightseers. So I thought I would give this movie a try. I am sad to say that I did not like this movie at all. I would definitely not recommend it

B00B19FYOQ.title: Art direction and acting
B00B19FYOQ.text: I enjoyed this take on the last days of Marie Antoinette Lea Seydoux and Diane Kruger make it well worth watching along with the great art direction and gritty grubby realism of revolution

B08713KH49.title: I don't know movies are hard to judge
B08713KH49.text: I really enjoyed the movie but towards the end it starts to get a little bit out there I mean I know the whole movie is out there but it gets to a point where it's almost too much so kind of throws it 2 a almost cringey movie I don't know I mean I would watch it again just to see if I missed anyting I can't remember what I paid for it

B08713KH49.title: Realistic
B08713KH49.text: This was a really good movie and definitely a different plot than the usual aliens starting war movies. My guess is that if you didn't like this, is because you expected the same boring action crap that is always in alien movies. Grow up.

B08713KH49.title: Aliens are real!
B08713KH49.text:
After seeing Proximity, I'm convinced Aliens are real. They have to be, visual effects aren't that advanced, are they?
The Producers nailed it. I wish I could see this in theaters! The sound design deserves more than my, not-so surround sound. The acting was top notch, what an awesome cast of characters! The chemistry between all the players felt effortless and fun to watch. That Ryan Masson (Isaac) is a star! Am I right?
I want to see more from this team!

B077FFCKWD.title: TERRIBLE movie, don't rent.
B077FFCKWD.text: They should NOT have put a picture of Melissa McCarthy on the front of the movie. She had one very small scene, which she probably regrets. It was one of the worst, most cheesy movies I have ever seen. I kept watching, though, hoping it would get less cheesy and pick up a bit. It was terrible. I wish I could get my money back from this rental.

B077FFCKWD.title: Funny and wonderful!
B077FFCKWD.text: I loved this movie! Even though I knew it was a spoof, I thought a lot of the recipes looked good- particularly those with chocolate. Melissa McCarthy was a mess- and I enjoyed every minute of her!!

B077FFCKWD.title: I was not disappointed. There were so many surprise guest stars
B077FFCKWD.text: I started laughing at the opening credits, so I knew right off I was in for a real treat.  I was not disappointed.  There were so many surprise guest stars, even Uncle Jim from Haters Back Off.  Fabulous ending too!  Loved it!!

B077FFCKWD.title: I honestly love the way all the stories kept moving without really ...
B077FFCKWD.text: I had the pleasure of watching the film this afternoon and I thought it was an absolute hoot. I honestly love the way all the stories kept moving without really leaving anyone out. The humor was intelligent and sometimes a little poignant as it certainly gave everyone the opportunity to examine their own less than stellar relationships with loved ones and the dreams we chase, even as we laugh. I'm not sure it was intended it to be that deep; for me it was.

B077FFCKWD.title: Love this movie
B077FFCKWD.text: Love this movie. Just hilarious. I have watched it two times and have a few hours for a third time. My husband and I can’t stop talking about the different scenes and laughing about them.

B077FFCKWD.title: Great Time full of Laughs and ❤️
B077FFCKWD.text: If you want to get away from all the whacky and surreal moments that keep popping up each day in our news, then watch this film! It's just silly old fashioned I love Lucy meets it's a mad mad mad world! I laughed and it felt great to giggle and belly laugh! Thank You Bruce Cameron and Cathryn Michon for making movies that give us a reprieve from thinking and entertain us with humor and ❤️.

B077FFCKWD.title: 5 star with tons of stars and lots of amazing jokes!!!
B077FFCKWD.text: I loved it.  The jokes were so subtle that I guess most of the lower star counts didn't catch them.  Great cast and ridiculously hilarious!  An entire cooking competition based off cooking without fresh food only processed crap.  Loving it!!!

B077FFCKWD.title: Stop!!! Do not rent this you will regret it.
B077FFCKWD.text: Absolutely the worst movie I have ever watch in my life . So disappointed to have Melissa McCarthy in it , not her normal caliber of movie . Save you money

B094S64YJ5.title: Decent execution, nothing spectacular
B094S64YJ5.text: Pretty good from a technical and aesthetic standpoint, did a good job of creating and maintaining tension. Manages to only slightly outweigh a thin story stretched beyond reason and a few narrative choices that treat the audience like they wouldn't be able to remember something from 30-40 minutes earlier. That said, the performances were fine, especially the child actor who basically had to emote physically the entire time. What little visual effects they had were fine considering what was probably a low budget. All things considered it was "fine," but nothing more.

B094S64YJ5.title: Bleak, lazy movie with miserable ending
B094S64YJ5.text: What a waste of $7. This brave little kid just wanted his mommy back and a voice of his own-- you really root for him, you want him to be triumphant-- and he gets punished and loses everything. The worst ending I've seen since Oculus. A much, much better "be careful what you wish for" movie is Pyewacket. Don't bother wasting your money on this one and go see Pyewacket instead.

B094S64YJ5.title: really knows how to build suspense
B094S64YJ5.text: really good movie. randomly had it pop up on Showtime and decided to give it a watch. despite taking place in a very small space, it had some great suspense, some super creepy moments, and the music was awesome.

B094S64YJ5.title: Don't Waste Your Time
B094S64YJ5.text: One of the cardinal sins of filmmaking is predictability, a transgression this film violates multiple times during its 81-minute runtime (which seems much longer while watching it). Despite some atmospheric cinematography and an occasionally intriguing production design, the film suffers from numerous narrative inconsistencies, as well as unexplained plot devices and, of course, the aforementioned predictability. Save your money.

B0849Q3KKF.title: Waste of time
B0849Q3KKF.text: FAR from the storybook.  Took forever to get to the point. The ending was plain dumb. First thing I thought of when the movie was over....I need to leave a review.

B0849Q3KKF.title: The horror tale we should of gotten as kids!!
B0849Q3KKF.text: This movie right here ..is the most beautifully crafted old school revamped horror movies I've watched in a very long time. The story plot is so adult sinister and the furthest from the fairytale we were told as kids ..this my fellow horror lovers..is the version we should have gotten as kids! Much appreciated as an adult tho! Best horror movie yet of 2020

B0849Q3KKF.title: An Interesting Take on an Old Story
B0849Q3KKF.text:
This does eventually get down to Gretel leading Hansel (she's very much his older sister) into the woods, where they find a house with lots of food in it.
All the time. Even though nobody goes to the store.
This is, then a mystery as well as a witch story, and quite interesting in its way.

B0849Q3KKF.title: Confusion in Gothic Darkness
B0849Q3KKF.text: I really actually liked the movie, however, if you are going to go all "artsy" you need to be prepared for rough reviews.  The visuals were AMAZING but the dialog and consistency of the script were wondering and confusing.

B00AXJIM7Q.title: Compliance
B00AXJIM7Q.text: I saw a trailer for the story and knew I had to see it. I cannot believe people could be so gullible. It is said it was a true story and if that is true it was shocking.

B00AXJIM7Q.title: Skip it.
B00AXJIM7Q.text: This is inspired by true events, hoora but it just seems a pointless exercise to watch it. Not a single great scene in the movie, just a continuous monotone beat.

B00AXJIM7Q.title: Great movie!
B00AXJIM7Q.text: Great movie to describe the human inherent tendency of submission to authority.  For people who simply don't believe that the story could even happen, this is a great opportunity to acquire the capacity to learn and grow.  In this movie, only a few people were fooled to a certain extent for a few hours; in the recent history of mankind in some countries, there were tens and hundred of millions of people were fooled to certain extent for decades, people went much further than spanking.

B005DD7Q9M.title: Good shark movie, which is unusual.
B005DD7Q9M.text:
I watched this due to the review by the top reviewer, and after watching it, echo the review.

Why did I watch this? I feel like for almost 2 hours I was stranded in the middle of the ocean and there were sharks mucking about.

This was good. Inspired from a true story, which is sad.

B005DD7Q9M.title: Great suspense and edge of your seat value.
B005DD7Q9M.text: Had to give this a 4 star for the suspense and edge of your seat value.  The water is beautiful and so is the boat.  Acting is good and for the most part believable.  The women did way too much screaming and thrashing about.  Not a good idea if a shark is close by.  This is not jaws movie.  I felt it was a better script and the scare and suspense felt real.

B005DD7Q9M.title: Great movie
B005DD7Q9M.text: This is one of my favorite shark movies. The best part is they use real sharks. No fake robot or computer animated sharks here. Just real Great Whites! It's terrifying to think about being stranded in the open ocean.

B005DD7Q9M.title: I bet $10 you can predict the ending...
B005DD7Q9M.text: Absolutely worst movie I’ve ever seen in my life. I’d give it 0 stars if possible. The acting was horrible. The plot was predictable and atrocious. The female characters were so obnoxiously damsel in distress it was sickening. I will never get that 1hour 27 minutes back of my life. I’d rather get that time back then a refund. The most annoying female character is the only one to survive in the end...really? She should’ve pulled him up out of the water. She didn’t try hard enough.

B005DD7Q9M.title: Gripping, realistic, well acted
B005DD7Q9M.text: The best shark-hunting-humans film I've seen. Simple and believable set-up and excellent unspooling of the terror as we become invested in the characters. The shark doesn't become some sort of over-the-top monster, just remains a predator.  The intercuts of the shark and the swimmers is a slow-build with realistic shocks, and I didn't for a moment get a feeling of some kind of special-effects at work. Very well done.

B005DD7Q9M.title: Best shark movies since Jaws
B005DD7Q9M.text:
So many films have tried to reach the level of thrill and authenticity that Spielberg captured with JAWS. So many have failed - Deep Blue Sea, the Shallows, Open Water, Shark Night 3D.... the list goes on and on.

The Reef is the closest any shark film has come - maybe because it drew from actual events, or maybe because the director is an Aussie star with several great creature-features to his name (you should see Black Water if you like crocodile movies). Either way, it works.

B005DD7Q9M.title: really boring
B005DD7Q9M.text: Characters keep getting sidetracked from simply swimming to safety, by reacting to the horrors of shark filled waters as if it's a new thing even an hour into the movie. So dumb. All the 5 star reviews have just got to be from paid trolls, because this is so stupidly done.

B005DD7Q9M.title: bedtime movie, better than counting sheep.
B005DD7Q9M.text: overall wasn't the worst thing I have ever watched, that being said I was very glad it was free on prime. not much of a story, not much logic and it was basically 89% people swimming slowly waiting to be picked off. the ending had me surprised, but it wasn't a good surprise. it seemed like what would have been a midway on an A caliber movie was the ending to this. no conclusion on the man smart enough not to swim in open water.

B005DD7Q9M.title: I would rather go back to watching the original Jaws movies than waste my time here
B005DD7Q9M.text: Sorry, but I got over halfway through this movie and no action...then when there was a shark attack it was totally predictable. I would rather go back to watching the original Jaws movies than waste my time here....

B005DD7Q9M.title: Put on your seatbelt for this one! Put a lid on your popcorn so it doesnt go all over the place!
B005DD7Q9M.text:
Excellent very intense scary movie very much like Jaws but very realistic. I felt like I was terrified you can picture yourself
being in the place of these people. Man o Man very very rough situation great movie!!

B006LM6P0K.title: Love it!
B006LM6P0K.text: This movie was awesome!  I wasn't really into watching another animal movie, but my BF talked me into seeing this movie, & after I did I just had to own it.  Great movie indeed.

B006LM6P0K.title: Incredible film
B006LM6P0K.text: This is an incredible film that really makes you think and you actually believe this happen.  The ending of the movie and the way humans will face near extinction is a big surprise.  Better than all the other Planet of the Apes and I am a fan of the original, but this one is just very very good.

B006LM6P0K.title: R.E. Rise of Planet of Apes
B006LM6P0K.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. Received in a timely manner and movie is excellent. Love all the planet of the apes movies and looking forward to the new one, Dawn of the Planet of the apes!

B006LM6P0K.title: Great Movie!!
B006LM6P0K.text: I got the movie for a great price. I would recommend it to anyone who love science fiction. It is a great movie and the Seller was very fast on send it to me. Thanks and I would buy from the seller again.

B003E48U9M.title: Worth the watch
B003E48U9M.text: Very good indie film, in spite of the "legend" there isn't much gore really but it revels in the tricks it plays on your mind, the dinner scene at the end is terrifying and haunting. Also, watch the documentary "Chainsaw Massacre Revisited" - you learn a lot about the making of the film and why it was a well crafted romp.

B003E48U9M.title: This is a classic horror cult film. Not a ...
B003E48U9M.text:
This is a classic horror cult film. Not a lot of surprises but on a scare factor 9.5 out of 10.
Chainsaw still keeps my attention years after I first saw it.

B075SN3HKW.title: which inspired this was only slightly better. I will stick with the Pre 52 Batman ...
B075SN3HKW.text: Although it showcased the one thing that all of the other Batman adaptations seemed to lack, this was a horrid adaptation.  There was so much that could have been done to improve this that they did not do.  I guess I should not have expected much since I was not a fan of the writer.  Mike just is too hit or miss for me and his graphic novel, which inspired this was only slightly better.  I will stick with the Pre 52 Batman as the only one around.

B083LGV145.title: I love this show so I paid to watch more seasons!
B083LGV145.text: Seasons 1-11 are included with Paramount (Prime). The last two seasons cost about $20 each. I love this show so I was willing to dish out the money. I’m very sad that it was cancelled due to the idiotic Woke movement. This show was great!

B083LGV145.title: I want a refund!!!
B083LGV145.text: This is complete bull!!! It’s Ink Master! The pint of the show is to crown a winner not cut off at the finally. I get vivid stopped production but give a warning before people spend $24.99 on a season. I mean give a discount atleast. Don’t charge the same price as a whole show! I’m incredibly disappointed!

B083LGV145.title: Bummer for Ink Master purchase
B083LGV145.text: Paid to watch the season because we switched from Directv and when we get to finally, Covid 19 prevented them finals, no winner announced and a cash prizes were awarded.

B083LGV145.title: Love this show
B083LGV145.text: Nice to have the option to watch on line as our cable company removed this station from our line up.  Took a star away because Amazon charged more for this last season then they did for all the others.

B083LGV145.title: Great reality TV!
B083LGV145.text: My teen son and I have been watching Ink Master for many years. We LOVE it and excitedly await each new episode and season.  We especially love the format of season 13!

B083LGV145.title: Waste of money
B083LGV145.text: I love Ink Master and watching them through has been an awesome experience until this season. It’s the only one that costs money and it cuts off before the finale. No other episodes or videos to show the tattoos at all. There’s no option to ask for a refund either so have fun with the $25 Amazon, don’t spend it all in one place.

B01C8BP9Y0.title: Great movie if you like mushroom cloud pictures
B01C8BP9Y0.text: Spectacular mushroom cloud shots from what I think is a fascinating time in history (the 1950s). Great music (Moscow Symphony Orchestra) and narration (William Shatner). Coverage of some of the experiments in "peaceful nuclear explosives" (which turned out not to be as useful as they thought: atomic-powered fracking, anyone?).

B0033CTKBC.title: I loved it. this movie is action packed and tell's ...
B0033CTKBC.text: I loved it. this movie is action packed and tell's fact's about real american history. I could watch this with my teenage children. stay woke and educate the children about history and todays money.

B0033CTKBC.title: Great Western
B0033CTKBC.text: It tells the forgotten story of the black cowboys of the west you have to watch it to understand, Im not going to write a long review about the movie, because everyone is a critic so just see for yourself you be the judge.

B0033CTKBC.title: Steroetypes
B0033CTKBC.text:
First of all, I hope you didn't misread the title. I did, and was disappointed.
That having been said, and after reading some of the other reviews, I was not impressed. Seen better, and apparently I am one of the few people on the planet with an education that understands that not all settlers (read: foreign invaders to this country) were white. What, do people actually believe the Hollywood stereotypes? Seriously?

B0033CTKBC.title: Horrible Movie, Dont bother wasting your time
B0033CTKBC.text: Don't waste your time. Everything about this movie is cheap, the screen play, acting and costumes. You would enjoy washing dishes more than having to watch this movie, I promise!

B07W1B346P.title: Inspiring
B07W1B346P.text: This show not only helped me learn of options and resources but it reignited my love for humanity and made me feel better about the idea that there are some wealthy people who really do care about helping people and that they are capable of remembering what it was like before they were wealthy and that their wealth did not change them entirely!

B00AUVPGMG.title: Well, for $1.99 I won't shed any tears
B00AUVPGMG.text: This is NOT an advanced class. It's a very basic hatha yoga class. Mainly I found the "teacher" to be annoying and kind of douchey. Why is he topless and wearing jeans when teaching? There's no reason for that. He looks half dressed. Imagine a topless lady yoga teacher for comparison. The gratuitous skin, the hair & non-stop chitter chatter makes you think a mindless metal hair band guy decided to get out of music and into yoga.

B07SKWC14V.title: The final episode season 4
B07SKWC14V.text:
I was glad I ordered this since I missed the finale. I love this show and the Bravo channel. Looking forward to the next season. I am and have been a prime user /member for years and I was really disappointed that I had to pay to see this.
I was a little set back with the price though. Overpriced in my opinion. Amazon needs to consider shows to be no charge to prime members in good standings

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Simple interesting and direct to the point
B07H4ZNPWD.text:
Simple interesting and direct to the point
Tackles big life issues while taking care of problematic people And a really fun way that
well Hollywood used to but just doesn’t do any more

B07H4ZNPWD.title: My New Favorite Show
B07H4ZNPWD.text: A very quirky somewhat dark 30-min. show that keeps you hanging onto every piece of dialogue.  Never thought a bad guy could be so good.  I just discovered this gem so am glad I could get Season 1 on Amazon.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: A fresh and welcome face!
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Great show! Based on Scott Ryan's indie film "The Magician" (wrote and starred), ruthless hitman Ray Shoesmith is surprisingly true to his beliefs and to his family and friends, but he's got a job to do and is unapologetic about that.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: It's ok.
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Not as stellar as I expected but not bad either. Dark and realistic; a bit of a downer if you don't step back and just see the whole picture of the portrayed "journey"/struggle.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Not for the squeamish
B07H4ZNPWD.text: It's an extremely violent look at the world we live. Scott Ryan is the creator, producer, writer, and star of the show and is in one word awesome. I just love the show. great cast of characters and story lines intertwine throughout both seasons.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Amazing
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Absolutely amazing. Regular guy by day, hirman/money collector at night. Each episode is about 25 mins so you can watch all 6 seasons in under 2 1/2 hrs which kind of just makes it a really great movie. After only 6 episodes it was clear that this has become a favorite of mine.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Great, great new show!
B07H4ZNPWD.text:
I absolutely love this show. ‘Dark comedy’ describes it well in my opinion. Ray is a caring, protective dad and a great friend. Also, a hit man. 😬. I kind half-watched the first episode and halfway through Episode 2, I started all over again because it deserves my complete attention.
I’m soo happy it’s been renewed, and I cannot wait till Season 2.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Top
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Easily one of the best TV shows I've ever seen. Leave it to people from other countries to come up with stuff that's not some kind of watered down, half-[mast] bull[feces] that you usually get from the US. Ridiculously entertaining, couldn't recommended it any higher.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: This show rocks
B07H4ZNPWD.text: I love Australian TV shows. The writing and humor is right up my alley. This is a dark comedy about a guy with issues, but you kind of love him and his family as he deals with life and his crazy job. I highly recommend.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Moral High Wire
B07H4ZNPWD.text: I like the series but it walks a very fine line with the approach and perspective on violence. In the bonus material the lead character is described has having a good moral center. Seriously? This is someone who commits violence and murder for a living, and in one case of mistaken identity where he murders the wrong person, he attempts to make amends to the family with money but otherwise seems unshaken and unremorseful. Maybe if there are more seasons this will be addressed and resolved as part of the lead character's story arc.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Mr In Between is really on top of the situation!
B07H4ZNPWD.text: This show is so compelling! Just a shocker of delightful mishaps and sordid details! YET, touching with a slice of empathy as needed...Funny and just an overall MUST WATCH! You will not be disappointed !

B07H4ZNPWD.title: interesting character
B07H4ZNPWD.text: yet another professional hitman series - but used as premise for quality dark comedy.  has all the unnecessary gratuitous violence disired,  plus it is good to know that there are thousands of hit man positions keeping unemployent figures down.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Finally a real show.
B07H4ZNPWD.text: I really enjoyed watching this show. Characters were great, the writing was fast and tight, and the situations were hilarious (to me). I am hoping and hoping this show will be renewed and have more than one season. But, I have probably just jinxed it and they will cancel it like all of the other one-season shows I've watched.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: If writing, acting, and dark humor is your thing...this is THE show!
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Ran up on this by accident when I saw the Season 2 teaser on FX during 'It's Always Sunny...' - it was the scene when the cops visit Ray and each question is answered by 'I don't answer questions.'  Leaves the cops speechless and me in stitches!  Have hooked friends into the current season and just bought Season 1.  Tight, tight writing, superb acting, and the situations are hilarious in a dark-comedy kind of way.  Here's to a successful run for a long, LONG time!

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Best Show Ever???
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Yeah, I think this may be my favorite show of all time.  It has everything.  Great drama, suspense, plot twists, action, humor, fantastic characters, great acting, awesome Aussie slang, and many powerful and intriguing themes.  Above all, I find the characters genuine and extremely likable, despite their questionable lifestyle choices...  I'll be coming back to this series, again, to spend more time with these characters.

B07H4ZNPWD.title: I enjoy Mr. In Between
B07H4ZNPWD.text: 👌👌I enjoy watching Mr. In Between, what I don't like is paying for Amazon prime and still having to pay to watch movies and having to pay over$1.99 as a subscriber, it's a bit excessive. 🤨

B07H4ZNPWD.title: My Hero
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Finally a guy who gets it! Kick the crap out of the Aholes in the world because everyone else puts up with them and you wont. Hes just doing what needs to be done!

B07H4ZNPWD.title: Great show
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Not knowing anything about it, I started watching this show on a Delta flight and I was hooked. They only had the first four episodes, so after I blew through those I gladly bought the final ones here. I just wish there were more. Hoping for a second season!

B07H4ZNPWD.title: This is a half-hour show that everyone in showbusiness should watch and learn.
B07H4ZNPWD.text: Mr Inbetween is a masterclass in visual storytelling. Due to the prestien writing of this show, expositional dialog is kept to a minimum allowing the story to be told through incredible camera work and acting. It is a must see for anyone that enjoys cinema.

B074N9R5JC.title: Always the hero
B074N9R5JC.text: This is my second round with this series.  It's been 15 years since I first watched it.  This second time was just as exciting.  Reminders about bits of the Napoleonic Wars, and little bit about India.  It's a fun watch.

B074N9R5JC.title: Sharps Tiger is the foundation the whole story, this is based on the book Sharps Tiger
B074N9R5JC.text: This one needed to come first as establishes the foundation for all of the Sharp stories. Do yourself a huge favor and read or listen to all of these books. I have at least three times. Better late than never I guess...but it should have been the first story in the Sharp Saga.

B08HVZ3BYH.title: If rented be sure you have the time deticated to watch a miniseries disguised as a long movie
B08HVZ3BYH.text: Way to go Rooster Teeth! We hope theres more of this beautiful syle animation available in the future. Stunning visuals, darling storyline, very inclusive with some adult or mature themes.

B07H92XX1F.title: Great new show
B07H92XX1F.text: When I get hooked on a good one, I'm always hoping for more episodes before the season ends. I love this show and watch on an 8" Kindle. As with another review I just wrote, I love the characters, cast, and story lines. Definitely 5 stars in my book.

B07GN1GC7Q.title: My husband's show.
B07GN1GC7Q.text: I watch this show because my husband enjoys it. We share things and sometimes he watches what I like and sometimes I watch what he likes. I guess it makes us better.

B07GN1GC7Q.title: Amazon is cutting off the last part of the show
B07GN1GC7Q.text:
After paying $30 for the season, I am very disappointed that the playback video cuts off before the show is over. I've watched two so far and it happened on both. The last lines of the show are lost. Any fan of Tim Allen knows his last words are an important part of the show!

For the price, the content should be delivered 100%- even the credits should play.

B07GN1GC7Q.title: love it
B07GN1GC7Q.text: I paid for a season...just know it is not done making the season...save your money and wait till they are done. I  still don't understand why they would charge for a season if it isn't out....

B07GN1GC7Q.title: love this show.
B07GN1GC7Q.text: tim allen and nancy travis are an exceptional team.  love the new cast and thought I would hate them.  sorry grandpa died but all must change with 18 month delay.  great show

B07GN1GC7Q.title: Last Man Standing Season 7
B07GN1GC7Q.text: This is just a great t.v. series that is completely suitable for EVERY family!  I keep looking forward to the very next season!  Even with Mandy being replaced there is still a good connection with the characters and the inside jokes are hilarious in regards to all the changes.

B07GN1GC7Q.title: Keep the series coming great show on TV
B07GN1GC7Q.text: Love Tim Allen great show they need more family shows like this out there I'm getting tired of send reality shows great work Tim Allen keep up the great work

B07GN1GC7Q.title: Show cuts off
B07GN1GC7Q.text: I downloaded the season of "Last Man Standing".  For every episode, it as if the last few minutes are cut off.  The show abruptly ends without actually seeing the ending.  Very frustrating!

B07GN1GC7Q.title: Good Show and I enjoy the great character interactions.
B07GN1GC7Q.text: "Last Man Standing" is just a fun show that tells a really well developed story. It provides a great deal of well thought out interactions with a good mix of comedy. I'd recommend this series to anyone.

B07GN1GC7Q.title: One of my all time favorite sitcoms
B07GN1GC7Q.text:
Most of today's sitcoms are junk. Bad story lines, not funny and boring.
Last Man Standing breaks that mold. One of my all time favorite sitcoms. Got even better when changed networks

B07GN1GC7Q.title: Love the writing in this program
B07GN1GC7Q.text: Great writing of all dialog, especially the humor.  All the characters talented.  I am unhappy about their choice of the new actress portraying their daughter.  She is not as talented as the former actress playing that part.  Did not like the fact that they changed her hair color, and the new actress is much taller.  But the jokes and other dialog is amazing.  So glad that Fox picked it up.  Tim Allen is a genus and so talented..

B006LM6P0K.movie_title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
